data.content: Genera un top-level con un item de presentación, un item de preguntas y respuestas y un item para pedir una pizza. Genera SOLO el top-level.

Here is the complete YAML content for the top-level module as per your request. It includes an item for presentation, an item for questions and answers, and an item for ordering a pizza.

```yaml
# -----> File: top_level.yaml <-----
modules:
- name: top-level
  kind: menu
  presentation: |
    Welcome to our pizza ordering chatbot! Here you can ask questions about our menu or place an order for your favorite pizza.
  fallback: I'm sorry, I did not get what you said. Can you rephrase?

  items:
  - title: Pizza Q&A
    kind: module
    reference: pizza_qa
  - title: Order a pizza
    kind: module
    reference: order_pizza
```

Make sure to create the corresponding modules for `pizza_qa` and `order_pizza` to ensure the chatbot functions correctly. Let me know if you need help with those!
